messages.content: Define an user with first name and last name
An user with a first name and last name was defined using a class called User with properties for firstName and lastName.
Full name of user is first name and last name
The full name of the user was determined to be the combination of their first name and last name.
Initials of user is first letter of first name and last name
The initials of the user were generated using the first letter of their first name and last name.
List all users whose last name is 'Doe'
All users whose last name was 'Doe' were listed.
